title: La Famille Blaireau-Renard
overview: The Badger family's life is very quiet until Mrs. Fox and her daughter Rosie move in. The lively Mrs. Fox brings joy back into Mr. Badger's life but for the children it means having to accept a new sibling. Ultimately, they learn to get along: all's well that ends well, The Mr. Badger & Mrs. Fox book series has been translated into fourteen languages, touching on living together in a blended family, celebrating differences, and emotion recognition.
